resources.string:
LiveSoccer is an application to control and follow your soccer league.


This app will allow you to:


-See played seasons:
 In the beggining tab, Matches, we can see the results of the 5 matches of every season.

 -See teams ranking:
 In the Teams tab we can see the league ranking of each team, according to their puntuation.

 -See players ranking:
 In the Players tab we can see the league ranking of each player, according to their goals.

 -Register a new season:
 In the Matches tab press the button "+" to add the information of the 5 matches of a season, and the players that goaled in each match.

 -Discharge/Input a new team on the league:
 In the Teams tab press the button "+" or inside a team press the button "Discharge" to discharge a team and add the information and badge of a new team.

 -Discharge/sign up a player on a team:
 In the Players tab press the button "+" or inside a player press the button "Discharge" to discharge a player and sign up a new one on its place.


The fact of dischargin a team or a player will not erase the data of the matches already played, so that you can keep control of new leagues without losing the results of previous ones.
